ExecutableTestSuite.label: Conformance class: GML application schemas, Buildings (for Buildings3D)
ExecutableTestSuite.description:
This test suite examines the GML encoding of spatial objects specified in the INSPIRE GML application schema 'Buildings'. Both currently approved GML application schema versions (3.0 and 4.0) are tested. It is dedicated only to the 3D Building application schema.

This is a draft version. It has limitations and is expected to contain errors. Please report any issues or problems in GitHub.

Known limitations are documented in the description of the applicable test case or test assertion. There is a general limitation in all assertions that extensions in additional application schemas are only supported, if the unqualified name of the feature type in the extension is the same as the name of the feature type in the INSPIRE application schema.

Source: Conformance Class 'GML application schemas, Buildings'

Pre-requisite conformance classes:
  • Conformance Class 'INSPIRE GML application schemas'
ExecutableTestSuite.author: Consortium Bilbomatica, Guadaltel y Geograma

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestCase.label: Basic test
TestCase.description: Verify that the spatial data set contains at least one Buildings feature.

TestAssertion.label: bu-gml.a.1: Buildings feature in dataset
TestAssertion.description:
Check that the set of features in the spatial data set is not empty.

Source: Abstract Test Case 'Basic test', INSPIRE Data Specification on Buildings, A.1.1, (A.6.1)
TestAssertion.expression: let $featuresFromAppSchema := $features[self::bu-core2d:Building || self::bu-core3d:Building] return (if ($featuresFromAppSchema) then 'PASSED' else 'FAILED', if (not($featuresFromAppSchema)) then local:addMessage('TR.noFeature', map { 'theme': 'Buildings' }) else ())
